Message: Are you still awake babe? I can't stop thinking about you.
Yeah, I'm still up. I've been thinking about you too.
I wish I could be with you right now. I miss you so much.
Me too. I can't wait for the party on Friday.
About that... There's going to be alcohol there. Is that ok with you?
I'm not sure. I haven't really drunk before. You'll look after me though, right?
Of course I will. I'll make sure you're safe. I promise. xxx
How are you feeling about Friday night?
A bit nervous but excited too. What should I wear?
Something sexy ;) I want to show you off to my friends.
I'll see what I can do. I don't want to disappoint you.
You could never disappoint me, Lottie. I love you. xxx
Are you in bed yet? I wish I was there with you.
Not yet, soon though. I wish you were here too.
Send me a pic of you in your PJs? I want to see what you look like before you go to sleep.
Ok, but you have to send me one too! :P
Deal. Can't wait to see you. xxx
Only 2 more days until the party! I'm so excited to see you.
Me too! I'm a bit nervous though. What if your friends don't like me?
Don't be silly, they'll love you. Just be yourself. xxx
What are you up to babe?
Just watching TV with mum. You?
Not much. Just thinking about you. I can't wait for Friday. xxx
Me neither. I love you. xxx
One more sleep until the party! I'm so excited to see you tomorrow.
I know, I can't wait! I love you. Goodnight xxx
Goodnight my love. Sweet dreams. xxx
I'm starting to get ready for the party. What time are you picking me up?
I'll be at yours around 10:30pm. Can't wait to see what you're wearing. xxx
Ok, I'm ready. I hope you like it.
I'm sure I will. You always look amazing. See you soon! xxx
Wow, you look incredible babe. I'm so lucky to have you.
Thank you. You look great too. I'm so happy we're here together.
Do you want a drink? My mate's got some vodka.
Ok, but just a small one. I don't want to get too drunk.
Come dance with me babe. I love how you move.
Ok, but I'm not very good at dancing! Lol
You're a great dancer! Let's take a selfie together.
Ok, but don't post it anywhere without asking me first.
Of course not. It's just for us. xxx
I had such a great time with you last night. I wish we could do it again soon.
Me too. I'm a bit tired though. Lol
Aww, poor baby. I wish I could be there to tuck you in. xxx
That would be nice. I wish you were here too.
Can I call you? I want to hear your voice before I go to sleep.
Ok, but not for too long. I'm really tired.
Ok, just a quick chat then. Night night, beautiful. xxx
Night Jack. Sweet dreams. xxx
I can't stop thinking about you, Lottie. I wish I could see you right now.
I wish I could see you too. I've been thinking about you all day.
What have you been thinking about? I bet it's the same as me. ;)
Maybe. But I don't know if I'm ready for that yet.
Oh come on, don't be such a tease. You know you want to. xxx
I'm not teasing. I just don't want to rush things.
Fine. But you can't blame me for trying. You're just so hot. xxx
Thanks. I think you're hot too. I just want to take things slow.
Ok, ok. I get it. Let's just chat about something else then. What do you want to do this weekend?
I don't know yet. Maybe we can just hang out together?
Sounds good to me. Maybe we can go for a late night walk or something? xxx
That would be nice. I like spending time with you.
Me too, babe. Me too. xxx
Send me a pic of you in your PJs? I want to see what you look like before you go to sleep.
Ok, but you have to send me one too! :P
Deal. Can't wait to see you. xxx
I was thinking about you all day. I can't wait to see you again. xxx
I was thinking about you too. I just don't want to feel rushed.
I know, I know. I just can't help it. You're so gorgeous. xxx
Thanks. I just want to feel comfortable with things.
Ok, I understand. Let's just take things at your pace. I don't want to upset you. xxx
Thank you. That means a lot to me.
No problem, babe. I just want you to be happy. So, what do you want to do tomorrow night?
How about we watch a movie at my place? Mum will be out so we'll have the place to ourselves.
Sounds perfect. I can't wait. xxx
